title: ISO 8601 calendar week calculation
name: LGF_GetCalendarWeek_ISO
description: This function uses the specified date to calculate the calendar week and the number of days that have passed since the beginning of the year for ISO 8601 European countries.

input.name: date
input.description: Date used to calculate the calendar week and days since 1 January

output.name: calendarDay
output.description: Days past since January 1st on given date

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

status_codes.16#8201: ERR_LIM_DATE Date out of the range
